data.meta_description: Movies Similar to Septembers of Shiraz: Balloon (2018), The Passage (2007), Betrayed (2014), The Devil's Dominoes (2008), The Dark House (2009), The Wrong Student (2017), Fatal Justice (2012), The Guvnors (2014), The Corrupted (2019), The Devil's in the Details (2013)
